Idea Description: Create a mobile companion app for the task management system
Implement machine learning to automatically prioritize tasks based on user behavior
Add voice commands for hands-free task management
Enable real-time collaboration on shared tasks and projects
Create detailed analytics and reporting for task completion patterns
Sync tasks with Google Calendar Outlook and other calendar applications
Add dark mode option for better user experience during night work
Create a library of pre-defined task templates for common workflows
Allow creating tasks directly from emails and sending task updates via email
Enable basic task management functionality when offline
Add built-in time tracking for tasks to measure actual vs estimated time
Add points badges and achievement system to motivate task completion
Allow users to add custom fields to tasks for additional metadata
Develop REST API to allow integration with external tools and services
Add internationalization support for multiple languages
Implement powerful search capabilities with multiple filter options
Enable bulk editing deletion and status updates for multiple tasks
Create visual dependency charts to show task relationships
Implement automated data backup and recovery mechanisms
Optimize application performance for large datasets and many users
Implement advanced security features including 2FA and audit logging
Create customizable dashboard widgets for quick task overview
Add resource allocation and management features for projects
Implement intelligent notification system based on user preferences and behavior
Add comprehensive data export/import functionality in various formats
